metadata.title: CVE-2021-29376 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ircII before 20210314 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(segmentation fault and client crash, disconnecting the victim from an IRCserver) via a crafted CTCP UTC message.

criterions.comment: ircii: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
